CustomField.description: NICC-046276 When checked the priority will remain static and will not be change when automated priority recalculations occur. Edit access to this field is controlled by the "AH Project Backlog - Edit Priority Override Fields" permission set: https://amadeus-hospitality.lightning.force.com/lightning/setup/PermSets/page?address=%2F0PS3g000000g8wR
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked the priority will remain static and will not be change when automated priority recalculations occur.
CustomField.label: Priority Overridden
